pages.text: The $(thing)Electric Grill$(), with 10 slots, is an upgrade to cooking over a $(thing)Firepit$().$(br2)The power draw is the same when cooking one item or ten, so bulk cooking is advised.

The $(thing)Fridge$() is a long term food storage. It has 9 slots for keeping items preserved and cannot hold other inventories; i.e. small vessels.$(br2)The Fridge will only consume power if there is an item inside.
The $(thing)Fridge$() requires $(thing)Purple Steel$(), making it challenging to obtain.
